Segment.name: SCH
Segment.comment: To specify the data for scheduling a specific line-item

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: EntityIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier1
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Time1
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier2
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Time2
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

Field.name: RequestReferenceNumber
Field.comment: Reference number or RFQ number to use to identify a particular transaction set and query (additional reference number or description which can be used with contract number)

Field.name: AssignedIdentification
Field.comment: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set
